episodes.title: Clémence Michallon: Cults and Killer Secrets in OUR LAST RESORT
episodes.description:
Clémence Michallon is in the Killer Author Club talking all things Our Last Resort, a haunting thriller set against the eerie isolation of a remote Utah resort. She shares her deep research into cults (and her personal connection to the Nxivm cult), how a single haunting song sparked the idea for the novel, and what it takes to psych herself up to write in a language that isn’t her native tongue. This week’s episode is about resilience, reinvention, and the stories we’re compelled to tell.

OUR LAST RESORT is a most anticipated book of the summer by The New York Times, USA Today, Oprah Daily, Boston Globe, Marie Claire, Crimereads, Apple Books, Goodreads, Brit + Co, She Reads.
